attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enable the monies to be made available to build the Severn barage at all good speed. Water levels are rising so lets protect your West Country voters of all parties, by building protection for them on the form of a power generating barage stretching from Weston to South Wales along the lines of previous scale drawings...NOW...not when its too late and half the Estuary towns are under water and thousands of lives lost. The Power generated will be approx. 6-7% of the National usage and all CLEANLY made from incoming and outgoing tides.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
